name: core-selection

events.name: core-select
events.description:
Fired when an item's selection state is changed. This event is fired both
when an item is selected or deselected. The `isSelected` detail property
contains the selection state.

params.name: detail.isSelected
params.description: true for selection and false for de-selection

attributes.name: multi
attributes.description: If true, multiple selections are allowed.

methods.name: getSelection
methods.description:
Retrieves the selected item(s).
getSelection will return an array, otherwise it will return 
the selected item or undefined if there is no selection.

methods.name: isSelected
methods.description: Indicates if a given item is selected.

params.name: item
params.description: The item whose selection state should be checked.

methods.name: select
methods.description:
Set the selection state for a given `item`. If the multi property
is true, then the selected state of `item` will be toggled; otherwise
the `item` will be selected.
